name: .KWD File Extension
summary: Learn about .KWD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Text document created with KWord, a frame-based word-processing and desktop publishing program; includes advanced page formatting options and uses paragraph style sheets to apply styles to text, tables, columns, borders, etc.

content: KWord is part of KOffice, an integrated office suite for Unix and Linux-based workstations. Developed specifically for the K Desktop Environment (KDE). The KOffice suite is offered as a free download at KOffice.org.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
